stimulusHtml: For  y≤11 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3A3D@ , find the y-coordinate of each point on the graph where the line tangent to the graph at that point is vertical.

features.html: The graph of the equation  x 2 =−2+y+5cosy MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4224@  is shown above for  y≤11 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3A3D@ . It is known that  dy dx = 2x 1−5siny MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4379@ . The x-coordinate of point P shown on the graph is 2.
